Ash_Fall.display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Ash_Fall.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage over time. Also, your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Curse.display_help: You place a curse on your target, darkening their soul and weakening their body. The target suffers energy and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their combat speed, chance to hit, range and healing effectiveness.
Curse.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Heal,Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Range(Foe)

Condemnation.display_help: You speak words of condemnation while coalescing a mass of dark energy between your hands. When complete, you hurl this mass at your target, striking them with the full fury of your words. The target suffers energy and negative energy damage, and may be terrified by the force of your condemnation.
Condemnation.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for Fear(Foe)
Condemnation.display_target_help: You are afraid and find combat action more difficult.

Castigation.display_help: You speak vicious words of castigation at the opponents arrayed before you. These words have a debilitating effect on the morale of afflicted targets. In addition to sustaining negative energy and energy damage, your targets suffer from reduced regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance.
Castigation.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), -Def(Foe,All), -Res(Foe, All)
Castigation.display_target_help: Your regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance have been reduced.

Lamentation.display_help: You cry out in a sorrowful lamentation, causing energy and negative energy damage in those around you. There is a chance that your lamentations affect your enemy so deeply that you may feed upon their suffering, healing yourself and increasing the endurance cost of their powers.
Lamentation.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT(Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe,All), Chance for Heal(Self) and +EndCost(Foe)
Lamentation.display_target_help: Your defenses, resistances, regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

Blizzard.display_help: All enemies within the blizzard suffer continuous lethal and cold damage and reductions in their movement speed and recharge rate.
Blizzard.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced, and you are suffering damage over time.

Snow.display_help: All enemies within the blizzard suffer continuous lethal and cold damage and reductions in their movement speed and recharge rate.
Snow.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced, and you are suffering damage over time.

Boon_of_Death.display_help: Boon of Death heals you and your allies over time.

Charge.display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.
Charge.display_target_help: You are still charged from Chain Lightning. Energy may jump from you to another target.

Charge.display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.
Charge.display_target_help: You are still charged from Chain Lightning. Energy may jump from you to another target.

Charge.display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.
Charge.display_target_help: You are still charged from Chain Lightning. Energy may jump from you to another target.

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn.
Blazing_Arrow.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed.
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a block of ice. Once free, your attack rate and running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Seasons_End.display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and unleash a quick succession of strikes at your target. While the attacks are so fast that the target is unable to catch fire, they suffer a tremendous burst of damage and have a chance to be knockdown with the final blows.
Seasons_End.display_target_help: You are caught in the Season's End, suffering fire and cold damage from a frenzy of blows.

Winters_Hearth.display_help: You immobilize your target in a field of ice which focuses energy in such a way that it also sets them on fire. While immobilized, the target cannot be knocked back, but when freed they suffer from reduced movement and attack speed.
Winters_Hearth.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold, Minor DoT(Fire), Immobilize (Foe), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Winters_Hearth.display_target_help: You are frozen in place and on fire. After you are freed, you will suffer reduced movement and attack speeds.

Seasonal_Shift.display_help: You rapidly draw in an immense amount of energy from the outer reaches of a 30' radius around you, igniting it in a fiery burst. The region within 15' of you burns, causing fire damage and reduction in chance to hit on enemy targets, while the region between 15' and 30' of you freezes, causing cold damage and reducing enemy targets' movement and attack speeds.
Seasonal_Shift.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DoT (Fire or Cold), Special
Seasonal_Shift.display_target_help: You are affected by a seasonal shift around a Diviner. Depending on your distance from the Diviner when this attack is used, you will suffer either fire damage over time and a reduction in your chance to hit or cold damage and reduced movement and attack speeds.

Harvest_Blades.display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and slash your target. The fire blade deals fire damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Harvest_Blades.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Fire/Cold), Minor DoT(Fire), -Speed(Foe, All), -Recharge(Foe)
Harvest_Blades.display_target_help: You are on fire. Additionally, your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Autumnal_Equinox.display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
Autumnal_Equinox.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT (Fire), Hold(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe)
Autumnal_Equinox.display_target_help: You are frozen in place and being cooked within the ice. Once free, your attack and movement speeds will be reduced.

Antipodal_Strike.display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame, striking your target with both in quick succession. The fire blade deals fire and lethal damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold and lethal damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Antipodal_Strike.display_target_help: You are scorched and chilled. You are burning even as your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Earthquake_Master.display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Earthquake_Master.display_target_help: You are caught in a devastating earthquake!

Earthquake.display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake deals smashing damage and knocks down targets caught in its area. Additionally, because of debris thrown into the air, nearby flying characters can be knocked to the ground.
Earthquake.display_target_help: You have been knocked off your feet and are unable to fly.

Earthquake_Debuff.display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake leaves a cloud of dust and debris in the air. This reduces your chance to hit, slows movement and attack speeds and prevents flight.
Earthquake_Debuff.display_target_help: You have been weakened by the dust cloud remaining after the earthquake.

Spin.display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a Strike attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Weaken.display_help: You poison a single foe and significantly weaken her strength. The affected target's chance to hit, attack strength and the status effect potency are all reduced.
Weaken.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, the strength of your attacks and the potency of your powers' status effects have all been reduced.

Initial.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Initial.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)
Initial.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Ongoing.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Ongoing.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)
Ongoing.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

Hack.display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

Throwing_Knives.display_help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

Savage_Slice.display_help: You perform a powerful maneuver that deals a great amount of damage and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

Savage_Strike.display_help: You perform a devastating attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce its defense.

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a deadly song which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: You are terrified and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Your target is turned to stone by your gaze.

Screech.display_help: You unleash a hyper-frequency screech which deafens your targets, causing smashing and energy damage and stunning your target.
Screech.display_target_help: You have been stunned and your resistance to damage of all types has been reduced.

Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Aimed_Shot.display_help: You slash your foe with your claws, dealing a moderate amount of Lethal damage and reducing the target's defenses. This has a longer recharge than Swipe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Aimed_Shot.display_target_help: Your defenses have been compromised by your enemy's Slash attack.

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can immobilize most targets, though they are not prevented from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and limits movement.
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed, but are resistant to being knocked off your feet.

Morbid_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

Morbid_Hack.display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

Circle_of_Death.display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

Boon_of_Death.display_help: You channel death energy through yourself to a targeted foe. Boon of Death drains life energy from the target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit, damage and regeneration rate are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed.
Boon_of_Death.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, regeneration and damage have been reduced.

Enervating_Bolt.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.
Enervating_Bolt.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Deadly_Blast.display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.
Deadly_Blast.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and a reduced chance to hit.

Deaths_Embrace.display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
Deaths_Embrace.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Fire, DoT), Foe Hold, -SPD, -Recharge
Deaths_Embrace.display_target_help: You are frozen in place and being cooked within the ice. Once free, your attack and movement speeds will be reduced.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: You are terrified and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Maddening_Bolt.display_help: You fire a bolt of pure madness at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering the target's attack speed.

Monstrous_Scream.display_help: You unleash a fearsome howl which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Monstrous_Scream.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Monstrous_Wail.display_help: You unleash a dreadful wail which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and are knocked off their feet. There is a chance that an affected target will also be stunned briefly.
Monstrous_Wail.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Psionic), Knockback(Foe), Chance for Stun(Foe)

Debilitating_Venom.display_help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time while also lowering defenses. The toxins can stiffen muscles, holding the target in place.
Debilitating_Venom.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), DoT(Toxic), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Hold(Foe)
Debilitating_Venom.display_target_help: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your defense against all attack types is also reduced and you may be held.

Dreadful_Venom.display_help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time. The toxins can reduce strength, causing each action a target takes to cost more endurance.
Dreadful_Venom.display_target_help: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your actions cost more endurance to execute.

Exhausting_Venom.display_help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the nerves of the body suffer failure. The target takes additional psionic damage from this, along with reductions in regeneration, healing effectiveness, resistance and defense.
Exhausting_Venom.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Toxic), -RES(Foe, All), -DEF (Foe, All), -Regen, -Heal
Exhausting_Venom.display_target_help: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your regeneration, healing effectiveness, resistance and defense are also reduced.

Weakening_Venom.display_help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the muscles of the body are weakened. This causes minor lethal damage, but also reduces the target's chance to hit and damage potential.
Weakening_Venom.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT(Toxic), -DMG(Foe, All), -ToHit(Foe)
Weakening_Venom.display_target_help: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your damage potential and chance to hit are also reduced.

Enervating_Venom.display_help: You exhale a toxic cloud of venom in a cone in front of you. All targets caught within the cloud suffer toxic damage over time. Additionally, the venom drains endurance, lowers the target's recovery and reduces both attack and movement speeds.
Enervating_Venom.display_target_help: You are losing endurance and recover endurance more slowly. You also suffer reduced movement and attack speeds.

Terrifying_Visage.display_help: You unleash a terrifying scream which causes all nearby foes to tremble in fear. The mind of affected targets is so overwhelmed that it causes psionic damage.

Resistance.display_help: Lamashtu is a progenitor of all things terrible and poisonous. As such, she is strongly resistant to psionic and toxic damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: Lamashtu is a progenitor of all things terrible and poisonous. As such, she is strongly resistant to psionic and toxic damage.

Swipe.display_help: You swipe your target twice in quick succession with your daggers. This attack deals minor lethal damage, but recharges quickly.

Slash.display_help: You slash your target with both of your daggers. This attack is stronger than Swipe and takes longer to execute.

Eviscerate.display_help: You rear up on the snake portion of your body before bringing both of your daggers down forcefully, slashing multiple targets in front of you. The viciousness of the attack causes bleeding wounds on the targets caught in the slashing.
Eviscerate.display_short_help: Melee Cone (Narrow), High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Res(Foe, Lethal)
Eviscerate.display_target_help: You are bleeding and suffering from reduced resistance to lethal damage.

Shockwave.display_help: You project a shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. This shockwave travels in a wide arc, causing lethal damage and knocking back foes.

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a deadly song which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed.

Weaken.display_help: You poison a single foe and significantly weaken their strength. The affected target's chance to hit, attack strength and the status effect potency are all reduced.
Weaken.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, the strength of your attacks and the potency of your powers' status effects have all been reduced.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Lightning_Storm.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage over time. Also, your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Liquefy.display_help: The ground beneath you has been altered by liquefaction due to the earthshaking song of the Siren. You suffer reduced chance to hit, defense and movement rates, though there is a chance the earthshaking could knock you off your feet.
Liquefy.display_target_help: You are grounded and are suffering reduced protection from damage. Additionally, movement and attack speeds are reduced, along with your chance to hit.

Liquefy.display_help: The ground beneath you has been altered by liquefaction due to the earthshaking song of the Siren, which instantly causes you to suffer smashing and energy damage.

Meteor.display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
Meteor.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun
Meteor.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

MeteorHit.display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
MeteorHit.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun
MeteorHit.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Upthrust.display_help: You channel seismic energy into the earth, causing a micro-fault to erupt under your target. This causes a shard of rock to thrust upward out of the ground, dealing smashing damage. The force of the eruption also hits players with shards of rock, causing bleeding, can knock flying targets out of the sky, and knockback enemies.
Upthrust.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockdown
Upthrust.display_target_help: You are bleeding and your ability to fly has been hampered.

Shards_of_Stone.display_help: You launch a volley of stone shards at your target in a sweeping cone. These shards stab into the target, causing lethal damage. The force of the attack can also knock flying targets from the sky and has a chance to knock up ground targets.
Shards_of_Stone.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockup
Shards_of_Stone.display_target_help: You are bleeding and your ability to fly has been hampered.

Ash_Fall.display_help: You create a choking ash fall at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Ash_Fall.display_target_help: You are caught in a dangerous ash fall!

Earthquake.display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Earthquake.display_target_help: You are caught in a devastating earthquake!

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws flares at the target.
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: You launch a blast of fire at a targeted foe. This can also set the target on fire for a short period of time.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Breath.display_help: You breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone.
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Thunderclap.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow
Thunderclap.display_target_help: You have been disoriented by the thunderclap.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; her chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Block_of_Ice.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed and take some cold damage.
Block_of_Ice.display_target_help: You are frozen in a block of ice. Once free, your attack rate and running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other ice powers, Bitter Ice Blast can slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, as well as your movement and attack speed, have been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful lightning bolt from the sky, dealing energy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: A ball of electricity descends from the sky and erupts in a burst of electricity. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect and drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Chain_Lightning.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly.
Chain_Lightning.display_short_help: Ranged Chain AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Knockdown, -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe)
Chain_Lightning.display_target_help: You have been knocked off your feet. Also, your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Summon_Storm.display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Summon_Storm.display_target_help: You are caught in a dangerous Lightning Storm!

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Shadow_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy, this deals moderate negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.
Shadow_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Shadow_Gloom.display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.
Shadow_Gloom.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and a reduced chance to hit.

Shadowfall.display_help: Shadowfall unleashes a cone shaped burst of darkness. All targets within the modest range of this power suffer negative energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit.
Shadowfall.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Shadow_Drain.display_help: An unrelenting darkness falls over your target, draining her very essence of life. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you, healing damage you have suffered.
Shadow_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_BS.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_EB.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_AV.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Meteor.display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
Meteor.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun
Meteor.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Inferno.display_help: You unleash a devastating firestorm around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the defense and damage of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your fire damage and defense for a short while.
Inferno.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. You are also suffering from reduced damage and defense.

Blizzard.display_help: You create a localized blizzard around a single target which affects all caught within it, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the movement and attack speeds of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your cold damage and defense for a short while.
Blizzard.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Flow_Lightning.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Flow_Lightning.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)
Flow_Lightning.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Shadowstar.display_help: You unleash a devastating blast of shadow energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the chance to hit and regeneration of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your negative energy damage and defense for a short while.
Shadowstar.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG, High DoT, +DMG, +DEF (Negative Energy), -To Hit(Foe), -Regen(Foe)
Shadowstar.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and your regeneration have been reduced.

Fascinating_Song.display_help: You create a song which fascinates your target, infecting their mind with a distraction while you cause them harm. The target suffers energy damage from the song, while the fascination immobilizes them and reduces both their recharge and their chance to hit.
Fascinating_Song.display_target_help: You are fascinated. You have been immobilized and both your recharge and chance to hit have been reduced.

Exhausting_Song.display_help: You create a song which exhausts your target, draining the very life out of their bodies. The target suffers energy damage, followed by lethal damage over time. There is a small chance this life energy is returned to you.
Exhausting_Song.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Heal (Self)
Exhausting_Song.display_target_help: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

Painful_Song.display_help: You focus your energy to create pain in the mind of your target with song, causing energy damage. The pain caused is so excruciating that the target's mind makes it real, also causing them to suffer from wounds that inflict lethal damage over time.
Painful_Song.display_target_help: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

Forceful_Song.display_help: You gather your energy into a powerful, hard song, which crashes into your targets with great force. The impact causes smashing damage, some lethal damage over time and has the potential to knock affected targets off their feet.
Forceful_Song.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Forceful_Song.display_target_help: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

Sorrowful_Song.display_help: You serenade your targets with a song of woe and sorrow, drawing them into a well of depression. This causes the target to suffer energy damage. Additionally, the targets are afflicted with a loss of their will to live, which manifests in reductions to their regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance.
Sorrowful_Song.display_target_help: Your regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance have been reduced.

Seductive_Song.display_help: You enchant your targets with a song of beauty and promise, with the intent of luring them to their death. Any targets around you are enthralled by your song, and suffer energy damage. The seductiveness of the song leaves your target placated, even as you harm them, and allows you to withdraw to use your other songs.

Debilitating_Song.display_help: You unleash a song which can crumble the earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake that causes liquefaction of the ground. The impact of the sonic shockwave deals some minor damage and causes most targets to fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and defense.
Debilitating_Song.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), -DEF(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Movement(Foe,Jump,Fly), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

Fireball.display_help: You launch a fireball at your enemies. On contact, this fireball will erupt and set the main target and their nearby allies ablaze.
Fireball.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Harvest_Blades.display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and slash your target. The fire blade deals fire damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Harvest_Blades.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Fire/Cold), Minor DoT(Fire), -Recharge(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All)
Harvest_Blades.display_target_help: You are on fire. Additionally, your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Autumnal_Equinox.display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
Autumnal_Equinox.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Fire, DoT), Foe Hold, -SPD, -Recharge
Autumnal_Equinox.display_target_help: You are frozen in place and being cooked within the ice. Once free, your attack and movement speeds will be reduced.

Antipodal_Strike.display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame, striking your target with both in quick succession. The fire blade deals fire and lethal damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold and lethal damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Antipodal_Strike.display_target_help: You are scorched and chilled. You are burning even as your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Resistance.display_help: Sorceress Serene has been blessed by the seasons, gaining an increased resistance to both fire and ice.
Resistance.display_target_help: Sorceress Serene has been blessed by the seasons, gaining an increased resistance to both fire and ice.

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws flares at the target.
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: You launch a blast of fire at a targeted foe. This can also set the target on fire for a short period of time.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Thunderclap.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous crack of thunder that will stun most foes nearby.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; her chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Shadow_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy, this deals moderate negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.
Shadow_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Shadow_Gloom.display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.
Shadow_Gloom.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and a reduced chance to hit.

Resistance.display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.
Resistance.display_target_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

Talon_Blade.display_help: The Talon Blade curses its victims with negative energy, slowing them.
Talon_Blade.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced.

Talon_Blade.display_help: The Talon Blade curses its victims with negative energy, slowing them.
Talon_Blade.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced.

Talon_Crossbow.display_help: The Talon Crossbow inflicts lethal and negative energy damage on a target. The bolt sometimes hits with such force that the target is knocked back.
Talon_Crossbow.display_target_help: You have been knocked off your feet.

Swipe.display_help: You swipe your target twice in quick succession with your claws. This attack deals minor Lethal damage, but recharges quickly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Slash.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
